go_data.justification: RhoGEF functions as a Rho-specific GEF, mediating the regulation of Rho by G12/G13.
A putative RhoGEF mediates a signaling pathway for cell shape changes in Drosophila gastrulation.
RhoGEF can directly link Galpha13 to the regulation of Rho, indicating involvement in G-protein coupled receptor signaling.
